title: How Rose McGowan became a victim of her own victimhood

meta_data.description: Among the first Harvey Weinstein accusers and lynchpin of the #MeToo movement, McGowan’s activism is giving way to a fragile egotism
meta_data.news_keywords: Culture, Media, Television, Rose Mcgowan, Kenneth Anger, Perez Hilton, Lohan Lindsay
